name: Fiend Heart
description:
Eliza, the agile vampire girl lives alone in her castle, until one night she received unexpected guests and so, the opportunity to interact with other monster girls awaits. Avoid the obstacles and enemies with acrobatics moves as your progress your way through your castle and talk with a monster girl at the end of each level.

This game offers:

  • Easy controls let you jump, airdash, slide, backflip, walljump and attack all over the place.
  • 7 levels with obstacles, each one more difficult than the previous one
  • Enjoy funny interactions with the 7 monster girls at the end of each level.
  • Frame by frame drawn animation.
  • Sountrack entirely composed by me with love.
  • Play as a cute red head vampire.
